field.name: listing_order
field.label: Listings Ordering
field.description: As shown for each mode, some of them only work for com_content, while others work for all the Everywhere extensions including com_content.

field.name: tmpl_suffix
field.label: JReviews Theme Suffix
field.description: This suffix will be applied to the module view file and is useful to create multiple instances of the module that have different outputs.

field.name: tn_mode
field.label: Thumbnail Type
field.description: Scale creates thumbnail with specified width and height is scaled proportionately. Crop takes a square from the center of the image and scales to the specified width.

field.name: extension
field.label: Everywhere Extension
field.description: If you want to limit results to a specific extension, then enter it here (i.e. com_content, com_virtuemart, com_sobi2, etc.). Only ONE extension at a time!

field.name: custom_where
field.label: Custom WHERE
field.description: Custom WHERE for query. (i.e. Field.jr_brand LIKE '%Agfa%' OR Field.jr_brand LIKE '%Canon%'

field.name: slideshow
field.label: Enable Slideshow
field.description: The module will automatically advance pages

field.name: columns
field.label: Columns
field.description: Number of columns or items per row to show.

field.name: filter_listing_period
field.label: Submitted in past x days
field.description: With this setting you can filter the results to use listings submitted in the past x days. The setting works for: all modes.

field.name: filter_review_period
field.label: With reviews submitted in past x days
field.description: With this setting you can filter the results to use reviews submitted in the past x days. The setting works for: [top editor rated], [top/worst user rated] and [custom] modes.

field.name: filter_review_count
field.label: Review count higher than
field.description: With this setting you can filter the results to listings with having at least the defined number of reviews. The setting works for: [top/worst user rated] and [custom] modes.

field.name: filter_avg_rating
field.label: Avg rating higher than
field.description: The setting works for: [top user rated] and [custom] modes.
